TEXT.TITLE: U.S. TO SELL 12.8 BILLION DLRS IN BILLS
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Treasury said it will sell 12.8 billion dlrs of three and six-month bills at its regular auction next week. The March 23 sale, to be evenly divided between the three and six month issues, will result in a paydown of 2.875 billion dlrs as maturing bills total 15.68 billion dlrs. The bills will be issued March 26. Reuter
